TestSinglePlayerAdvanced - Class in edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.games.connectfour.AI
Test class for the Advanced AI Notes: (1)Make sure you FULLY understand the way the AI chooses its moves (1.a)To summarize, the AI will; Choose a winning move, else block the opponent's winning move, else, make a triple, else block a triple of the opponent, else, make a random move.
